features.feature01: A strange red glow emanates from all the leaves
features.feature02: At night, the woods lay down like they’re sleeping
features.feature03: Through the trees you can see yourself peering in
features.feature04: Trees move about whenever you look away
features.feature05: Spirits gather at the edge, always watching outwards
features.feature06: A shimmer of an old camp appears at twilight. Some nights, someone is having a campfire.

Quantum Woods.feature: A strange red glow emanates from all the leaves
At night, the woods lay down like they’re sleeping
Through the trees you can see yourself peering in
Trees move about whenever you look away
Spirits gather at the edge, always watching outwards
A shimmer of an old camp appears at twilight. Some nights, someone is having a campfire.
